ebf8273d6be6.title: I insist that the gov cover 100% of my mental health costs because US politics has driven me crazy.

paragraphs.text: I insist that the gov cover 100% of my mental health costs because US politics has driven me crazy. I started out tonight as my usual lefty self, horrified by everything republican and shuddering in disgust at everything Trump. I was reading about the satanic Koch bros when I was sucked into a worm hole about an ultra spooky guy named Robert Mercer…

7ba33ba696e.title: “Budget Director Mick Mulvaney went on CBS This Morning to defend a bill he’s played a key role in…

content.subtitle: ThinkPropaganda, your are lying again. What he said was to change your state legislatures and state laws.

paragraphs.text: “Budget Director Mick Mulvaney went on CBS This Morning to defend a bill he’s played a key role in crafting. While on the program, he offered some advice to people who require essential benefits but live in states that wouldn’t require them under the law: If you don’t like it, just move.”

c97d409b43c6.title: If they are going to remove essential services, then what the hell is the point in having insurance…

paragraphs.text: If they are going to remove essential services, then what the hell is the point in having insurance? These people are despicable. All of them should be forced to do without insurance.

c20b1fa2aa6e.title: Can we please dispense with the fiction that this is a healthcare bill?

paragraphs.text: Can we please dispense with the fiction that this is a healthcare bill? It is not. It is nothing more than a hodgepodge of extreme right wing ideologues’ pet policies that they have thrown together and falsely labeled. Like yet another huge transfer of wealth from the bottom and middle to the top, defunding Planned Parenthood, crippling Medicaid…

f973b21cc515.title: thank god Congressional Republicans are too busy fighting each other for anything to get done.

paragraphs.name: 24d3
paragraphs.text: thank god Congressional Republicans are too busy fighting each other for anything to get done. it feels weird to celebrate the incompetence of those running the government, but here we are. praise the lord, 2017’s evil is dumb as fuck.

content.subtitle: I am not pro crappy insurance. I am pro individual choice to insure the things you may need. After all, that is the definition of insurance…

paragraphs.name: b334
paragraphs.text: Why would someone not want control over markets closer to them (ie more influenced by their individual vote). In addition, the more local the control, the easier it is to vote with your feet. If citizens do not like that their crappy state will not cover maternity care, they can simply move to one that does.
